text: Silpa Bhirasri National Museum () is a modern art museum in Bangkok, Thailand. It is on the grounds of the Fine Arts Department in Phra Nakhon District. The museum consists of two parts, one displaying contemporary arts, and the other belongings of Silpa Bhirasri, the father of modern Thai art. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20080526043302/http://www.national- gallery.go.th/silpabhirasri/index.html Category:Museums in Bangkok Category:National museums of Thailand Category:Phra Nakhon District Category:Art museums and galleries in Thailand
title: Silpa Bhirasri National Museum
